wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Anthony Peter Bell (30 December 1923 – 21 November 1988) was an English professional footballer. A left-back, he played in 318 Football League matches for three clubs, most notably for hometown club Oldham Athletic. Bell features, along with his son Graham, amongst 'The Legends of Oldham Athletic'.

response: *Tommy Bell (Australian footballer) (1895–1955), Australian rules footballer for Essendon
*Tommy Bell (American football official) (1922–1986), American football official in the National Football League

*Tommy Bell (rugby union) (born 1992), rugby union player for London Irish
